kDesc
A masquerade ball would be incomplete without a mask! [#Legal]
Un bal masqué ne serait rien sous un masque! [#Legal]
Was wäre ein Maskenball denn ohne Maske?! [#Legal]
Un ballo in maschera sarebbe incompleto senza una maschera! [#Legal]
Un baile de disfraces no estaría completo sin una máscara. [#Legal]
A masquerade ball would be incomplete without a mask! [#Legal]

A masquerade ball would be incomplete without a mask! [#Legal]
